name: Porradaria 2: Pagode of the Night
description: O Ninja está de volta! Desta vez a procura do Lendário Saco de Batatas Fritas Infinitas!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 ou superior Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz ou superior Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 22 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Got it from a random Key from G(blankspacesoidontgetcensored)2A. One of the worst games in my library.
It's like one of those old ♥♥♥♥♥♥ newgrounds parody games, except this one has a price tag.
